articles.author: Guardian staff reporter
articles.title: Knight hits hat-trick as USA stun rivals Canada for world ice hockey crown - The Guardian
articles.description: Hilary Knight scored three times and the Americans rallied past Canada for their 10th women’s world hockey championship title on Sunday in Ontario
articles.content: For all the focus on the United States young and retooled roster, it was who else but Hilary Knight the teams most experienced and accomplished star who played a pivotal role in securing her nations … [+5608 chars]
